segments.text: The little girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that her brother is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever seen anyone get hurt before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t even notice how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but they’re so deep in their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely missing all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is acting in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all walk away from this unharmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I have a feeling someone’s going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
